AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be read automatically (type 'yes' to activate or 'no' to deactivate; don't write in capital letters)

GREET.description: When enabled, it automatically sends greeting message to members in your PM

AUTO_LIKE_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be liked automatically (type 'yes' to activate or 'no' to deactivate; don't write in capital letters)

AUTOBIO.description: Automatically update your bio status. Make sure to set your OWNER_NAME

CHATBOT.description: When activated, the bot will chat with everyone on your DM

TALKING_BOT.description: Bot will listen to voice notes and respond to them

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be downloaded automatically and sent to you (type 'yes' or 'no')

PM_PERMIT.description: Restrict other users from using your bot in private messages (type 'yes' or 'no')

AUTO_STATUS_REPLY.description: Type your genuine status reply message

ANTICALL_MSG.description: Type your anticall message to send when calls are declined. You can leave it blank
ANTICALL_MSG.value: > Ben Whittaker Tech Bot || No calls allowed.

BOT_NAME.description: Change this if you don't like my name

GROUP_CONTROL.description: Enable bot group control features like antilink, antispam, antibad

PUBLIC_MODE.description: Set 'yes' to make your bot public or 'no' to keep it private

SESSION_ID.description: Enter your session ID after scanning the QR code

URL.description: Change this image and input yours

AUTO_READ_MESSAGES.description: yes to activate, no to deactivate

NUMERO_OWNER.description: Your phone number (exclude '+' and area code, e.g., '254114141192')

WARN_COUNT.description: Set the warning limit for warning commands

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: Set 'yes' to display a starting bot message or 'no' to disable it

PRESENCE.description: Mark your presence: 1 for online, 2 for typing, 3 for recording, or leave blank for real state

AUTO_BLOCK.description: Automatically block users who insult you in DM (set 'yes' or 'no')

AUTO_REACTION.description: Enable bot reactions to messages in private chats (set 'yes' or 'no')
